configurationPanel.kpiCantBeFilteredByAt.value: The kpi cannot be filtered by {attributeName}. Unselect the check box.

configurationPanel.vizCantBeFilteredByDa.value: The visualization cannot be filtered by Date. Unselect the check box.
The report cannot be filtered by Date. Unselect the check box.

configurationPanel.kpiCantBeFilteredByDa.value: The kpi cannot be filtered by Date. Unselect the check box.

configurationPanel.drillConfig.interacti.comment: Header of a section where user can set drilling for some visualization widget containing some visualization (chart, table, etc). Interactions here stands for user interactions.

configurationPanel.drillConfig.addIntera.comment: Use imperative. Button label that is related to "Interactions" section. This button adds some drilling to a widget.

configurationPanel.drillConfig.clickHint.comment: Hint guiding users how to understand interaction (drilling) setting. Example in sentence: "WHEN I CLICK ON on value of measure 'Number of user accounts', drill into detail."

configurationPanel.drillConfig.measureVa.comment: Hint guiding users how to understand interaction (drilling) setting. Example in sentence: "When I click on VALUE OF MEASURE 'Number of user accounts', drill into detail."
Hint guiding users how to understand interaction (drilling) setting. Example in sentence: "When I click on VALUE OF METRIC 'Number of user accounts', drill into detail."

configurationPanel.drillConfig.attribute.comment: Hint guiding users how to understand interaction (drilling) setting. Example in sentence: "When I click on VALUE OF ATTRIBUTE 'Account', drill into detail."

configurationPanel.drillConfig.clickHint.comment: Do not translate <addon...> and </addon>, but translate (value of)

configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillDown.comment: Name of an option in dropdown that is used to select drill down type of dashboard drill.

configurationPanel.drillConfig.disableDr.value: Drill down is turned off in this visualization's configuration.
configurationPanel.drillConfig.disableDr.comment: The disable tooltip message for the Drill down item

configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillInto.comment: Name of an option in dropdown that is used to select type of dashboard drill.
Warning displayed in drill config when drill into URL has invalid parameters of custom URL.

configurationPanel.drillConfig.select.comment: Hint guiding users that drill actions in select box has to be selected. Use '…' as one character, not 3 dots ('...').

configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillInto.value: The date attribute value from the visualization will not be transferred to filter the target dashboard.
configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillInto.comment: Warning displayed in drill config when drill into dashboard has date attribute as source or in intersection

configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillInto.value: The date attribute value from the report will not be transferred to filter the target dashboard.
configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillInto.comment: Warning displayed in drill config when drill into dashboard has date attribute as source or in intersection

configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillInte.comment: Label of the dropdown to select drill intersection ignored attributes.
Title of the dropdown to select drill intersection ignored attributes.

configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillInte.value: Disable the attribute or date to exclude its value from being passed as a filter to the drill destination.
configurationPanel.drillConfig.drillInte.comment: Tooltip of the dropdown to select drill intersection ignored attributes.
Title of the dropdown, when all values are selected and none attribute is ignored.
Title of the dropdown, when no values are selected and all attributes are ignored.

configurationPanel.visualprops.inheritDe.value: Inherit the description from the visualization.
Inherit the description from the report.

configurationPanel.visualprops.customDes.value: Add a custom description for this instance of the visualization.
Add a custom description for this instance of the report.

gs.date.date-dataset.duplicityWarning.value: Another filter is using the same date dataset. Disable this filter or set a different date.

layout.widget.width.min.value: Widget is at the minimal width
layout.widget.width.min.comment: Shown as red text inside of widget if resized under min limit.

layout.widget.width.max.value: Widget is at the maximal width

dropzone.new.row.desc.comment: Used as placeholder when user drags some widget and tries to drop it on dashboard. Dropping the widget over such placeholder creates new section of a dashboard. Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <>. Translate words 'new section'.

dropzone.widget.desc.comment: Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <>. Translate word 'here'.

dropzone.widget.last.in.row.desc.comment: Used as placeholder when user drags some widget and tries to drop it on dashboard. Dropping the widget over such placeholder will cause adding the widget to an existing section of a dashboard. Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <>. Translate words 'existing section'.

dropzone.widget.last.in.container.row.de.comment: Used as placeholder when user drags some widget and tries to drop it on dashboard. Dropping the widget over such placeholder will cause adding the widget to an existing container of a dashboard. Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <>. Translate words 'existing container'.

deleteKpiConfirmationDialog.message.value: All alerts set up for this KPI will also be deleted.

newDashboard.dropInsight|insight.comment: A placeholder showed when user drags new visualization into a dashboard canvas by cursor (drag and drop).

newDashboard.dropInsight|report.comment: A placeholder showed when user drags new report into a dashboard canvas by cursor (drag and drop).

attributesDropdown.filterConfiguredMessa.value: {parentTitle} is already filtered by {childTitle} filter directly or through other filters.
attributesDropdown.filterConfiguredMessa.comment: Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <> and placeholders enclosed in {}.

attributesDropdown.attributeNameWithData.comment: Will be used in sentence between two nouns. For instance 'Filter by AttributeX with data of MetricY'

filter.visibilityMode.tooltip.hidden.value: This filter is hidden. It can be accessed only via the Edit mode.
filter.visibilityMode.tooltip.hidden.comment: The tooltip serves as a warning to the user that the filter will be hidden in view mode.

filter.visibilityMode.tooltip.readonly.e.value: This filter is locked. It can be changed only via the Edit mode.
filter.visibilityMode.tooltip.readonly.e.comment: The tooltip serves as a warning to the user that the filter will be locked, and the user cannot change its value in view mode.

filter.visibilityMode.tooltip.readonly.v.comment: The tooltip helps users understand why they cannot change its value.

filter.resetButton.tooltip.comment: The tooltip of the reset button in the filter bar

filter.crossFilterResetButton.tooltip.comment: The tooltip of the reset button in the filter bar

richText.deleteDialog.message.value: The rich text and all of its content will be irreversibly deleted.

visualizationSwitcherToolbar.visualizati.value: No visualization in switcher, add one to continue.

nestedLayout.emptyDropZone.active.messag.comment: , and {br} are HTML tags. Do not translate them.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.title.comment: The title of section that configures filters for listed values in the filter. There is a list of applied filters below the title.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.empty.value: Limit the filter menu options by applying a dashboard filter or adding a metric.
attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.empty.comment: Text shown when list of filters is empty.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addLin.comment: Link that adds a new filter.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addMet.comment: Title of popup with selection of metric that will limit listed values.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addFil.comment: Title of popup with selection of filter will limit listed values.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addIte.comment: Title of popup with selection of filter or metric that will limit listed values.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.search.comment: Placeholder in a search field. Use '…' as one character, not 3 dots ('...').

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.sumFac.comment: List item that represents filtering metric which is a sum aggregation of particular data fact. Do not translate placeholder {fact}. It will be replaced with the name of the selected fact in the runtime.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.countA.comment: List item that represents filtering metric which is a sum aggregation of particular data attribute. Do not translate placeholder {attribute}. It will be replaced with the name of the selected attribute in the runtime.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.metric.comment: Text shown when all items were used and there is none offered in the list.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.unknow.comment: The title of item in the list that does not have a title.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.search.comment: Text shown when entered search term do not match any item in the list.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.filter.value: No more dashboard filters to add.
attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.filter.comment: Text shown when all dashboard filters were used and there is none offered in the list.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addFil.comment: Title of section that describe the action user can choose. The action selects an existing dashboard filter to be used as a validation items to hide attribute filter elements.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addFil.value: Use an existing dashboard filter to hide irrelevant values.
attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addFil.comment: Description of section that describe the action user can choose. The action selects an existing dashboard filter to be used as a validation items to hide attribute filter elements.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addLim.comment: Title of section that describe the action user can choose. The action selects an existing dashboard filter to be used as a validation items to hide attribute filter elements.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addLim.value: Use a metric to hide irrelevant values. Only values with non-null results for the metric are shown. Learn more
attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addLim.comment: Description of section that describe the action user can choose. The action selects an existing dashboard filter to be used as a validation items to hide attribute filter elements. Do not translate and placeholders. They will be replaced with HTML tags in the runtime.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.common.comment: Do not translate variables enclosed in {}.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.addDat.comment: Title of popup with selection of date filters will available date datasets values.

attributesDropdown.valuesLimiting.disabl.comment: Do not translate variable enclosed in {}.

filters.filterViews.dropdown.buttonEmpty.comment: Title of the dropdown button that opens list of filter views (saved values) saved by the user.

filters.filterViews.dropdown.button.comment: Title of the dropdown button that opens list of filter views (saved values) saved by the user. Do not translate {count} placeholder.

filters.filterViews.dropdown.title.comment: Title of the dropdown with list of filter views (saved values) saved by the user.

filters.filterViews.dropdown.setAsDefaul.comment: Label of button that sets the filter view as default one.

filters.filterViews.dropdown.unsetAsDefa.comment: Label of button that unsets the filter view as default one.

filters.filterViews.dropdown.isDefault.comment: Text displayed next to the name of the filter view if it was marked as a default one.

filters.filterViews.dropdown.tooltip.value:
Views are saved sets of filters that let you quickly return to a specific filter state.

If you set a view as the default, it will apply automatically every time you open the dashboard.

Tooltip of saved views dropdown. Do not translate

and

tags.

filters.filterViews.dropdown.newButton.comment: Label of button that adds a new item to the list

filters.filterViews.dropdown.emptyList.value: You haven't saved any views for this dashboard.
filters.filterViews.dropdown.emptyList.comment: Text shown when list of views does not have any items in it.

filters.filterViews.toast.viewDeleted.comment: Text shown when filter view was deleted.

filters.filterViews.toast.viewApplied.comment: Text shown when filter view was applied.

filters.filterViews.toast.viewSetAsDefau.value: Great! Your view is set as default.
filters.filterViews.toast.viewSetAsDefau.comment: Text shown when filter view was saved as a default one.

filters.filterViews.toast.viewUnsetAsDef.value: Great! Your view is no longer set as default.
filters.filterViews.toast.viewUnsetAsDef.comment: Text shown when filter view was saved as a default one.

filters.filterViews.toast.viewNotSetAsDe.comment: Text shown when filter view was not saved as a default one.

filters.filterViews.toast.viewNotUnsetAs.value: Failure! Your view is still set as default. Please try again.

filters.filterViews.toast.viewNotApplied.value: Failure! Your view was not applied. Please try again.

insightAlert.config.comparisonOperator.g.value: Is greater than or equal to

insightAlert.config.differenceOperator.h.value: Difference{spacer}Calculates the net difference between primary (current time period) and secondary (previous time period) metric values.{spacer}FORMULA{spacer}Primary - Secondary

insightAlert.config.and.comment: This is a part of sentence 'for This month and 1 filter'

insightAlert.config.for.filter.comment: This is a part of sentence 'for This month and 1 filter'

insightAlert.config.delete.success.value: Success. The alert has been deleted.

insightAlert.config.resume.success.value: Success. The alert has been resumed.

insightAlert.config.pause.success.value: Success. The alert has been paused.
